amendatorysection.para: In addition to the tax imposed by sections 66-6,107, 66-6,108, and 66-6,109.02, each retailer shall pay an excise tax of two and eight-tenths cents per gallon or gallon equivalent on all compressed fuel sold for use in registered motor vehicles. The changes made to this section by Laws 2008, LB 846, apply for tax periods beginning on and after July 1, 2009.
